code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import{Card}from'semantic-ui-react';import Workout from'../Components/Workout';import{WorkoutContext}from'../context';var SavedWorkouts=function SavedWorkouts(_ref){var user=_ref.user;var workoutContext=useContext(WorkoutContext);var favworkouts=workoutContext.favworkouts,toggleFavs=workoutContext.toggleFavs,_setCountdown=workoutContext.setCountdown,replaceWorkout=workoutContext.replaceWorkout;return React.createElement(Card.Group,{style:{textAlign:"left",width:"80%"},itemsPerRow:1},favworkouts.map(function(exercise){return React.createElement(Workout,{user:user,saved:true,exercise:exercise,key:exercise.Title,replaceWorkout:replaceWorkout,setCountdown:function setCountdown(){return _setCountdown(parseInt(exercise.Duration)*1000);},toggleFavs:toggleFavs,favworkouts:favworkouts});}));};export default SavedWorkouts;
